text: Jayapura is a small town in Koppa taluk of Chikkamagaluru district of Karnataka, India. This town lies in the Western ghats. Agriculture is the main occupation with coffee, areca and paddy the major crops.first Jayapura was also known as solle bail according to the senior citizens of Jayapura this name is given to Jayapura by Mysore odeyars. Category:Cities and towns in Chikkamagaluru district
title: Jayapura, Chickmagalur
